page.title: 14A RETIRED PERSON'S STORY
page.content: I get up about 8.00am and have my breakfast of toast and tea. I then get washed, shaved and dressed. I like to work in the garden, and when I can, I repair lawn-mowers for people, as I used to be a mechanic. I sometimes like to go for a drive in the car. I like bird watching too. I find food is different nowadays. It is not as nourishing. I enjoy eating steak best, and I like a glass of beer, and a cup of tea or coffee. I have dinner about 12.15pm and tea about 5.15pm. I live with my sister who usually does the cooking, but I can cook if she is out. I like strawberries and raspberries. In the evenings I like to watch television. We have some cats, but I like dogs aswell. I have some supper about 10.00pm before I go to bed at 11.00pm.
